dict.acceptation: （人的）情况；局面，形势，处境；位置；[心理学]情境；

sent.orig: For a generic air flat, situation maps are used to describe the results of situation assessment.
sent.trans: 针对一类空中平台背景，用图形的方式来描述态势评估结果。

sent.orig: The reasons for this situation are many faceted. The September 11th incident obviously aggravated the situation.
sent.trans: 出现这种形势的原因是多方面的，“9·11”事件显然起了推波助澜的作用。

sent.orig: Kim Ji-new brief with the basic situation of Coal and technological innovation, personnel training situation.
sent.trans: 金智新简要介绍了同煤集团的基本情况及科技创新、人才培养方面的情况。

sent.orig: What we're dealing with is less a technical situation than a social-technical situation.
sent.trans: 我们现在处理的事情比社会-技术环境少了技术状况。

sent.orig: As the overall economic situation, economists said the weakness in personal consumption expenditure situation will continue.
sent.trans: 由于整体经济形势严峻，经济学家们认为个人消费开支疲软的状况还将继续。
